title: Rito Plz [shop suggestion]
body:
Can we get RP purchase options on bulk (ie 10) chests _or_ keys in the shop?
Not chests _and_  keys, but separately.

Like, I get more than 3 key frags per week, but chests have a 7 day cooldown.

Can you plz, so I can bulk buy some chests for my stockpiled keys? I don't wanna buy them at 125rp a pop, when I have like, many keys.

975rp for 10 chests _or_  keys +bonus essence would fit the current format.
